      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method calls the getUserDoor, revealDoor, getUserSwap, and newDoor methods
        Parameters:
        args - Standard array of commandline String arguments. Not used in this program.

      • getUserSwap

        public static boolean getUserSwap()
        This method asks the user whether they want to swap their or not.
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean whether the user wants to swap or not. (true to swap, false to stay)

      • revealDoor

        public static int revealDoor(int invalid1,
                             int invalid2)
        This method calcs and teturns a door for the host to reveals as not the GP door
        Parameters:
        invalid1 - A door that the host cannot open
        invalid2 - A door ths the host cannot open
        Returns:
        number of a door containing a goat

      • getUserDoor

        public static int getUserDoor()
        This method asks the user to choose a door number
        Returns:
        number of a door picked by user

      • newDoor

        public static int newDoor(int userDoor,
                          int goatDoor)
        This method switches the userDoor to the only other open door (not the goat door or the user door)
        Parameters:
        userDoor - the original door the user picked
        goatDoor - the door the program revealed that contains a goat
        Returns:
        the number of the new user door after they switched
